thread.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo Hit The Step-Back Buzzer-Beater To Sink The Knicks
thread.title_full: Giannis Antetokounmpo Hit The Step-Back Buzzer-Beater To Sink The Knicks

author: Ryan Nagelhout
title: Giannis Antetokounmpo Hit The Step-Back Buzzer-Beater To Sink The Knicks
text:
Giannis FOR THE WIN! @Giannis_An34 drains the step-back jumper at the buzzer as the @Bucks beat the Knicks, 105-104. pic.twitter.com/ATVy0ibzp6 
— NBA TV (@NBATV) January 5, 2017 

The Greek Freak can truly do it all. 
Giannis Antetokounmpo hit this step-back jumper at the buzzer to give Milwaukee the 105-104 win over the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday night. The standout point guard has been a nightly highlight reel for the Bucks this season. Tonight, his second highlight was even more impressive than his first .
